snippet: The investigation of a Cleveland police officer’s deadly shooting of a 12-year-old boy carrying a pellet gun will be overseen by the Cuyahoga County sheriff’s office.
abstract: Cuyahoga County sheriff's office will take over investigation into Cleveland police officer's deadly shooting of 12-year-old African-American boy Tamir Rice.
lead_paragraph: The investigation of a Cleveland police officer’s deadly shooting of a 12-year-old boy carrying a pellet gun will be overseen by the Cuyahoga County sheriff’s office.

headline.main: Ohio: Cleveland Hands Off Inquiry Into Boy’s Killing
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Cleveland Hands Off Inquiry Into Boy’s Killing
